about_the_game:
Forget the glory of battle and complex eSports maneuvers, and harvest the boundless joy of casual management in a limited miniature world!

Overview

The 【Box World】 series is a new game series from HataGames Studio.
Box World: Space Courier is the first installment in the Box World series, focusing on building a space station community with high operational efficiency and commercial value in space. Command your workers for a satisfying construction experience! And don't forget to take care of each of their emotions.
  • Simple and understandable economic structure

  • NPCs with humanized RPG elements

  • Light narrative guiding the gaming experience

  • Hidden goodwill from the developers

  • Rejection of frustration, NPCs to the rescue!

In this playful and pun-filled miniature world, calmly sketch out your own little world~ Make money! Make money! And make more money!!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft 64bit Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3200G+ or Intel Core 9100
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX12 based graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 100% DirectX9.0c compatible sound card and drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft 64bit Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3600 or Intel Core 9400f
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RX580 8G / GTX 1660ti or better
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 100% DirectX9.0c compatible sound card and drivers

short_description: "Box World: Space Courier " is a minimalist sandbox-style strategy management game. In this playful and pun-filled miniature world, calmly sketch out your own little world~ Make money! Make money! And make more money!!
supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Russian, Korean
